issue.title: INTEGRATION_plugin test failures in gazebo3 - default

content.raw:
Temporary band-aid in [PR 1341](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/1341). Recording some highlights of our discussion here:

`gzLogInit("test.log")` is called in the constructor `ServerFixture::ServerFixture`, but `gzLogInit("default.log")` is called later inside `gazebo::setup`. Therefore global `FileLogger` gets overwritten and logs to `default.log`, not `test.log`.

Best solution is probably to parameterize `gazebo::setup` to take a logfile name (default value of "default.log") and reduce calls to `gzInitLog` as much as possible so that `FileLogger` doesn't overwrite the contents of its current logfile, or write messages expected in one file to go in another.
